message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $105. How about we meet in the middle of my last offer and your offer, at $107.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $102. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I'm not willing to go as low as $102, but I'm willing to meet you at $108. That's the lowest I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $108, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $106?
